system.description: The character unleashes red bands of magic that lash out to capture their target.
system.effect: The character makes an Ego check with an edge against the Melee defense of a target in their line of sight. If the attack is a success, the crimson bands paralyze the target. On a Fantastic success, the target can be pinned too. Breaking out of the crimson bands requires a Melee check with target number 20.
